values: 碗；钵；一碗（或一钵）的量；球形物；碗状物；圆形剧场；球场；盆地；碗状凹地；奖杯；保龄球；[运动]木球；（植物的）球茎
投球；滚动；快速移动；（在板球中）使…出局；击倒（保龄球瓶）；快速行驶；（向某处）迅速移动；滚动前进

synonym.mean: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
投球；旋转；平稳快速移动

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 圆顶礼帽；投球手；玩滚球的人

word_group.brief_definition: 饭碗；稻米之乡；米粮仓；生计
金鱼缸；无法隐蔽的地方
风沙侵蚀区；干旱尘暴区
讨饭碗；行乞碗；求乞；求援；求助
大酒杯；大碗；大酒杯酒吧
超级碗星期日；超级碗周日；超级碗星期天

bilingual.source: There is some rice in the bowl.

bilingual.target: 我的肚子里有一碗水果！

bilingual.source: For dinner, you can eat a bowl of rice.
bilingual.target: 晚餐你可以吃一碗米饭。

bilingual.source: A bowl of soup with a large, round meatball!
bilingual.target: 一碗汤配一个大而圆的肉丸！

bilingual.source: Place the blown-up balloon in an empty bowl.
bilingual.target: 将吹起的气球放在一个空碗里。

list.abstract: bowl（英[bəʊl]，美[boʊl]），英语单词。作名词时释义为碗；钵；圆形剧场。作动词时，释义为滚；投（球）手；急速移动。短语搭配有a bowl of（一碗）。例句：I'd like a bowl of beef noodles.（我想要一碗牛肉面。） bowl的复数为bowls。作名词时，其近义词有knurr、rummer；作及物动词时，其近义词有slip、slide。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's like summer in a bowl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好像夏天被放在碗里。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I put some flour in the bowl. Ooooo!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我把一些面粉放进碗里。噢！！！

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, are all the tickets in the bowl? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的彩票都在碗里了吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry, somebody's sitting there. Who? My physics bowl trophy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，有人坐那儿。谁？我的物理碗奖杯。

yingyinNormal.en: Good afternoon, and welcome to today's physics bowl practice round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下午好，欢迎你们来到今天的物理碗大赛练习赛。

yingyinNormal.en: We have a bowl. Our keys go in a bowl. You should get a bowl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有个碗，钥匙都放那个碗里，你应该弄个碗。

yingyinNormal.en: Look around. You're in a bowl. Bowl's gonna fill up. Ain't no way out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看看，你们等于住在碗里，碗一装满水就无处可逃罗。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, this cereal has lost all its molecular integrity. I now have a bowl of shredded wheat paste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太棒了，这碗麦片再不彼此分子独立了，我现在有一碗麦片糊了。

yingyinNormal.en: Just turn it around in the bowl very gently. And begin to crush the dough together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢慢地在碗里拌匀，接下来开始和面。

yingyinNormal.en: My grandmother used to make this with a big wooden spoon and a big, big bamboo bowl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我奶奶以前用大木勺和大竹碗来搅拌。

yingyinNormal.en: We are entering the physics bowl, and we need a fourth for our team.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正准备参加物理碗比赛，而我们队现在三缺一。

yingyinNormal.en: Cover up your bowl and what that will do is prevent the air from drying out the crust on that and actually prevents it from growing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用保鲜膜把碗盖起来，这样不会让空气进入碗里，把面团的表皮风干了，那样面就不能醒了。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, we're gonna put our hands in this bowl, and we're gonna start squishing the tomatoes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来，我们把手放进这个碗里，然后开始把番茄压碎。

yingyinNormal.en: This into a bowl, and I'm just going to create a delicious marinade for the chicken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将鸡肉放进碗里，接下来我要做一点美味的酱汁来腌制鸡肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? So, you didn't get all snarky 'cause I said something nice to a bowl of chili fries?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？那你生气不是因为我对一碗辣味薯条说了句好话？

yingyinNormal.en: Who says you can't get a nice punch bowl for under six bucks? Maybe we can take it back?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁说买不到,六块钱以下的高级鸡尾酒碗？或许我们能把它退回去？

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you smashing a flash-frozen banana? Because I got a bowl of Cheerios and I couldn't find a knife.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要砸碎速冻香蕉？我有一碗麦片，又找不到刀子。

yingyinNormal.en: It's gotta be one of a kind. You know like, you know, what's that God awful ceramic fruit bowl she has on her counter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她喜欢独一无二，就像她那个丑到不行的水果陶碗。

yingyinNormal.en: Inside the forest was a little house. And inside the house was a bowl of porridge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这件森林深处有一间小屋。而在这间小屋的桌子上放着一碗热腾腾香喷喷的粥。

yingyinNormal.en: I know someone who would disagree. Who? My physics bowl trophy. Leonard is so smart. Sheldon who?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道有人不同意。谁？我的物理碗奖杯，莱纳德真聪明，谢尔顿是谁？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 保龄球；地滚球；投球；十柱保龄球戏；撞柱戏；投球手的力量

word_family.mean: n. 碗；钵；圆形剧场；圆球；投球时间；投球机会；奖杯；一碗（或一钵）的容量；物体的圆形凹处；盆地

examination_example.sentence: Children were split into three groups, with one group asked to try the <highlight>bowl</highlight> of carrots repeatedly with no further encouragement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们被分成三组，其中一组被要求在没有进一步鼓励的情况下一直试着吃这碗胡萝卜。

examination_example.sentence: Presenting a water <highlight>bowl</highlight> to a Savannah may also prove a challenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给萨凡纳猫一碗水也可能是一个挑战。

examination_example.sentence: The children were then given a <highlight>bowl</highlight> of boiled carrots and told to choose how much to eat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后给孩子们一碗煮胡萝卜，让他们选择吃多少。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: For the second test, in one case the thin actor took two pieces of candy from the snack <highlight>bowls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第二个测试中，在一个案例中，瘦小的演员从点心碗里拿了两块糖果。

examination_example.sentence: Big serving <highlight>bowls</highlight> and plates can easily make us fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用大碗和大盘子就餐很容易使我们发胖。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You tell them you have been full, but they will still put more food in your <highlight>bowl</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你告诉他们你已经吃饱了，但他们仍然会往你的碗里放更多的食物。

examination_example.sentence: Every half hour, the water <highlight>bowl</highlight> becomes full and sinks completely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每隔半小时，碗就会盛满水，然后完全沉下去。

examination_example.sentence: Use smaller rice <highlight>bowls</highlight> so that you serve less rice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用小一点的碗，这样你吃的米饭就少了。

examination_example.sentence: I’d like a <highlight>bowl</highlight> of beef noodles.
This is a <highlight>bowl</highlight> of rice with egg and pork pieces.
There is a large <highlight>bowl</highlight> of jiaozi on the table.
